dobra kontynuacja, polecam przy przechodzeniu gry za pierwszym razem nie próbować robić osiagniecia Tylko jeden naboj, bo utrudniając grę jeszcze ją wam ono znudzi; i z mojego doświadczenia powiem że dopiero jakiś czas później (w moim przypadku aż rok) zobaczyłem jak moj znajomy w to gra i natchnelo mnie to zeby przejsc jeszcze raz ale normalnie, co sprawilo mi w końcu frajdę z przechodzenia tej gry

[h1]戈登依然哑巴，但他不再孤单[/h1]
[h2]延续了HL2的高水准 这点不再赘述[/h2]

[h1]硬核程度全面上升，紧张时刻更为密集[/h1]
铁路恐怖感不输莱温霍姆，失去照明加之手电有电力限制，你甚至会有一种在玩L4D的感觉
因此除了剧情需要补完外，喜欢战斗的玩家将会有更刺激的体验

[h1]超前的搭档系统[/h1]
除了关卡设计和难度提升外，本作最显眼的区别是几乎全程有alyx陪伴你作战
众所周知HL的AI不同于普通脚本，alyx可以给你前所未有的体验
除了长得高一些，她就像TLOU的艾莉一样，也是因为这味调味剂，前面提到的恐怖和高难度有所缓解

[h1]故事在继续，悬念还未定[/h1]
阿狗的“人”设更丰富了，你会爱上这个机器人/狗？
虽然从高塔逃了出来，但事情远远没有结束，看到救自己的弗地冈人会不会想起初代的大杀四方？
布林倒台，全城的电视演讲变成了克莱纳博士，他希望重新拥有生殖权的人类可以抓紧时间“开工”，alyx也在吐槽，我知道，你跟我想的一样。
its epic

[h1]Half-Life 2: Episode One[/h1]
Je pokračování Half-Life 2 kde se znovu ujmete role Gordona Freemena a příběh navazuje na samotnou hru, Half-Life 2 v řádu několika minut. V příběhu se snažíte dostat z města 17 (city 17), kdybych řekl více byly by to spoilery kterým se snažím vyhnout. Jediný mínus je velmi krátká doba hraní, která tvoří pouze 5 hodin a dohrajete na 100% i se všemi achievmenty. Z původní hry zůstalo všechno stejné zbraně i většina nepřátel, za zmínění stojí pouze nový druh zombie, který přenáší a hází granáty...

+Česká lokalizace 
+Příběh
+Skvělá hudba

-Krátká hratelnost

[h1]7/10[/h1]
pero que buen juego woooooooooooo

Quem jogou os outros jogos da franquia e principalmente o segundo vai adorar esse. Se tu tiver ficado com vontade de mais gameplay ao zerar Half-Life 2, esse jogo é perfeito pra ti. Ele conta mais sobre a história do jogo principal. Na minha opinião, ele é muito bom, e não tinha como não ser, pois os gráficos, a gameplay, as armas e inimigos, são os mesmos de Half-Life 2, porque ele acontece depois desse. O jogo é curto, mas satisfaz um pouquinho a vontade de jogar mais, esse e o episode two, servem para matar a saudade e a falta de um terceiro jogo para a série.

While generally overshadowed by the phenomenal episode 2 this chapter has many of its own merits such as it's focus on a more cinematic and scripted story. As a whole I believe that this is the pinnacle in storytelling in the franchise and is overall underrated and overlooked by the community.
What's to say? Buy all Half-Life games. Play Half-Life from start to finish. All expansions and extras.  Honestly good cash paid for. 👍
I lied I fucking love this game and every one in the series lmao

You should play Half-Life 2 base game, episode 1, and episode 2 all together.  Episode 1 really is focused on the player using the Gravity Gun, to the point that there is an achievement for only firing one bullet for the entire game. (I did it, it's challenging but not too difficult if you accept the other focus for the game...)

The other focus of the game is the AI, most specifically of Alyx.  You are expected to allow the AI of various NPCs to do a lot of the shooting for you.  They do a serviceable job, and likely the intention narratively is to get you emotionally invested in Alyx.  I think this is one of the reasons people seem to dislike Episode 1 compared to the base game and episode 2.

It's the weakest of the three parts of Half-Life 2 I think, but felt fine to play, so don't skip it.

Great game
This game had a much better pace than the main half-life 2 game. It was the right length and that is a big reason why I enjoyed it more. It also had more story than its predecessor which is a plus.

It's more Half Life 2 - there's absolutely nothing to criticize if you're a fan of the main game. All the elements that made Half Life 2 amazing are here. As for the story, I felt it retained much of what's great about the series while also feeling unique enough to be its own game. But when people say Half Life 2 is a must-play, I see no reason not to include this and Episode Two along with it - they both earn their place in this legendary series.

This expansion blows.

I absolutely refuse to play this one to the end. Alyx is a pretty good character that's made incredibly unlikable in this game. My favorite sections of HL1, HL2, and even opposing force were when I was all alone to fight and experience the world around me, not when I had a companion by my side. 

My favorite part of this game was right at the beginning when I had to go out on my own, sadly she followed me for the rest of my play time after my short time away from her. right after that section of fun was a pitch black hell hole where you're barely given any ammo because they expect you to work with Alyx. but I don't fucking want to work with Alyx, I want to be on my own.

Its just a bunch of really shitty half life 2 levels. I'm writing this review after playing episode two and I can already say its infinitely superior to this. If you're looking to experience the story of the entire series then just look up the beginning and end of this game and skip to the second episode.

I enjoyed the episode immensely. I played the game a few hours a sitting over the course of three nights. Getting all achievements was really fun. Happy I came back to it in 2021 after playing on the release, great memories. If you are a fan of Half Life universe this is a "must have". It may also even surprise new players if you a enjoy a good game despite its age.

반쪽 삶 2: 이야기 1.

우주 수호자 고든 프리맨의 두 번째 이야기에 빠져든 팬들을 위한 선물. 하프라이프 3가 아닌 부제목으로 나온 영향인지 약 3시간 정도면 충분히 끝을 볼 수 있는 소소한 팬 서비스 같은 작품으로, 고든과 알릭스의 본격적인 협동의 시작과 새로운 싸움을 준비하는 내용을 담고 있다. 볼륨만 보면 다소 아쉬운 느낌이 들지만 이어지는 에피소드 2를 위한 준비운동으로 생각하고 다시 한번 고든의 이야기를 이어나가자.
